CustomField.description: The percentage of deployments this team started that succeeded, over the past 45 days. The nuance is we count any deployments that failed due to test failure as a success, as it isn't our fault. If no deployments in last 45, then 0
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The percentage of deployments this team started that succeeded, over the past 45 days. The nuance is we count any deployments that failed due to test failure as a success, as it isn't our fault. If no deployments in last 45, then 0
CustomField.label: Deployment success rate
